name: Kyle Comet and the Toxic Lab
name_original: Kyle Comet and the Toxic Lab
description:
A school trip to a scientific research facility ends in disaster as the mutants escape and wipe out your class. As the last kid standing you must fight your way through hordes of monstrosities to escape.
Tool up with an ultra cool plasma gun and head off into the creepy laboratory.
Blast the mutated creatures and collect the rewards.
Don't get too close to those bubbling barrels!
